entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Store ValueGenerator directly in IProperty runtime annotation instead of ValueGeneratorCache #31901
  • Search a table using a list of strings in EF Core 8 preview (where in clause) #31898
  • AddCheckConstraint in model produces different output on linux vs. windows #31895
  • Referencing a third table in `JOIN` clauses #31894
  • Change Tracker GetDatabaseValues #31892
  • Concurrency Detector loses lock when multiple contexts are used in a thread. #31890
  • Enforcing usage of FluentAPI instead of attributes #31889
  • Using HasData to seed values in a new table cannot retrieve ColumnTypes #31888
  • Test: different data between between complex navs tests and complex navs shared type tests #31887
    MQ
  • json column stored foreign key for table #31886

Closed

  • Data annotations for join entity on many-to-many #31882
  • Nullable Model Differences between EF Core 6 -> EF Core 7 #30502
  • Compiled model with enum member "Cannot access private method 'ConvertToEnum'" #31827
  • FilteredInclude does not filter when using SelectMany #31697
  • Query/Json: improve JSON entity/collection comparisons to null (fails currently for optional dependent with all nullable properties) #30589
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Mitigation for stack overflow with compiled model on Mac #31896
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.0
  • Fix lock loosing in concurrency detector for multiple contexts on one thread #31891

Merged

  • Rename UseAzureSql to UseAzureSqlDefaults #31897
  • [release/8.0] Fix to #30589 - Query/Json: improve JSON entity/collection comparisons to null (fails currently for optional dependent with all nullable properties) #31856
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.0
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore from 7.0.10 to 7.0.11 #31848
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31885
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/8.0] Handle more types of value converters in the compiled model #31861
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Stop storing model references in the ValueGeneratorCache #31867
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.24
